entities.name: grimmauld square
entities.description: The location where the bus was swaying ominously. ("It ru mbled around Grimmauld Square...")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who had his chair toppled over and Pigwidgeon flew out of his cage. ("Ron’s chair toppled right over...")

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: A bird that flew out of Ron's cage and landed on Hermione's shoulder. ("Pigwidgeon, who had been on his lap, burst out of his cage...")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends whose shoulder Pigwidgeon landed on. ("flew twittering wildly up to the front of the bus where he fluttered down upon Hermione’s shoulder in stead.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who narrowly avoided falling by seizing a candle bracket. ("Harry, who had narrowly avoided falling...")

entities.name: stan
entities.description: A bus driver who handed over their tickets and was enthralled at the scenery. ("‘Just outside Birmingham,’ said  Stan happily...")

entities.name: ern
entities.description: Stan's friend who he mentioned in conversation. ("I said to Ern, I said, ‘ ’e didn’t seem like a nutter when we met ’i m...’)

entities.name: birmingham
entities.description: A location that the bus was passing through. (‘Just outside Birmingham,’ said  Stan happily...)

relationships.description: The bus was swaying ominously around Grimmauld Square, where Harry was a passenger. ("It ru mbled around Grimmauld Square...")
Ron had Pigwidgeon on his lap before it flew out of the cage. ("Pigwidgeon, who had been on his lap, burst out of his cage...")
Pigwidgeon landed on Hermione's shoulder. ("flew twittering wildly up to the front of the bus where he fluttered down upon Hermione’s shoulder in stead.")
Harry was a passenger on the bus that was passing through Grimmauld Square. ("It ru mbled around Grimmauld Square...")
Stan was driving the bus through Birmingham. (‘Just outside Birmingham,’ said  Stan happily...)
